simplified: 牡丹虽好，全凭绿叶扶持

pronunciation.pinyin: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán píng lǜ yè fú chí
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 ping2 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2

details.simplified: 牡丹虽好，全凭绿叶扶持
details.traditional: 牡丹雖好，全憑綠葉扶持

meanings.value: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves . However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
